title: MC_CAM_REF (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_CAM_REF
This function block represents a generic cam.

rows.Name: wCamStructID
rows.Comment:
By means of this variable, which always has a constant value,MC_CamTableSelectchecks if the entered data structure is
of typeMC_CAM_REF.

rows:
Describes the cam type, that is the way in which the cam is
represented.

Defines the type of variables that enter in the curve table.
Only used for byType SMC_CAM_TYPE.X or SMC_CAM_TYPE.XY0: <unused>1:INT2:UINT3:DINT4:UDINT5:REAL6:LREAL

values available
